imagingbook.common.math.eigen
 

  • Uses of RealEigenDecomposition in imagingbook.common.math.eigen

    Classes in imagingbook.common.math.eigen that implement RealEigenDecomposition
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    EigenDecompositionApache
    An implementation of RealEigenDecomposition, which merely wraps an instance of EigenDecomposition as provided by the Apache Commons Math library.
    class 
    EigenDecompositionJama
    Eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a real matrix.
    class 
    Eigensolver2x2
    Implements an efficient, closed form algorithm for calculating the real eigenvalues (λ) and eigenvectors (x) of a 2x2 matrix of the form
    class 
    GeneralizedEigenDecomposition
    Solves the generalized eigenproblem of the form A x = λ B x, for square matrices A, B.
    class 
    GeneralizedSymmetricEigenDecomposition
    Solves the generalized symmetric eigenproblem of the form A x = λ B x, where matrices A, B are symmetric and B is positive definite (see Sec. 11.0.5. of [1]).
